subject: p15131736
History: Evaluation of the patient with COPD exacerbation.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. The ET tube tip is approximately 6 cm above the carina. The NG tube tip is in the stomach. Heart size and mediastinum appear to be unchanged since. Vascular engorgement and bibasal consolidations are unchanged as well. Right PICC line tip is at the cavoatrial junction.
